scenes.large_text: Mindset Matters: Shifting from Scarcity to Abundance
scenes.audio_text: Today, we're exploring shifting from a scarcity mindset to one of abundance.

scenes.large_text: So, what is a scarcity mindset?

scenes.large_text: Calm your mind, and dont respond to any events, always focus on how the current situation can help you reach your goals
